sentences.sContent: People sweat to regulate their body heat.
...MPs voted overwhelmingly in favour of Labour amendments to the children and families bill last February that included the power to regulate for plain packaging...
...Yellen is not one to buy into the finance industry's argument that it should be left alone to regulate itself...

synos.tran: 调节，规定；控制；校准；有系统的管理

trans.tranOther: to make a machine or your body work at a particular speed, temperature etc
